TopicTitle: Boxes on rocket that flash orange and red won't go away.

Articles.Content:
Started happening after loaded a save and wouldn't go away no matter how many times I loaded any save.

 

Heres image link: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1TtDfD-gGmqYNPThiLEJCqedO_tjYQj-4/view?usp=sharing
Goes away after restarting game though.
Did you happen to enable temperature gauges in the settings? Those look exactly like that
I had the temperature gauges on originally but when I turned it off and loaded the save multiple times it kept the rectangles on my screen. it would even show while I had the map up.
